results.title: The combination of metformin and 2-deoxyglucose significantly inhibits cyst formation in miniature pigs with polycystic kidney disease.
results.text_hl: KEY RESULTS: The three-dimensional reconstruction of CT scans indicated a markedly lower @<m>DISEASE_Hypotrichosis_And_Recurrent_Skin_Vesicles</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C567751 @@@renal vesicle@@@ index in the combination therapy group.

citations.NLM: Lian X, Wu X, Li Z, Zhang Y, Song K, Cai G, Li Q, Lin S, Chen X, Bai XY. The combination of metformin and 2-deoxyglucose significantly inhibits cyst formation in miniature pigs with polycystic kidney disease. Br J Pharmacol. 2019 Mar;176(5):711-724. PMID: 30515768
